SELECT u.user_id userId, u.user_name userName, u.user_state userState, u.user_img userImg, u.create_time createTime, d.`dept_name` deptName FROM `sys_user` u LEFT JOIN `sys_dept` d ON d.`dept_id` = u.`dept_id` WHERE 1=1
AND u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
ORDER BY u.`create_time` DESC
select m.resource FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
